Detailed Description

LogicalCollection represents mapping of objects onto a partition set.

void Sched::LogicalCollection::insert ( DFG::GlobalData::Id  gdid,
PartitionSet::value_type  part 
)

insert a global data to the site of execution gid A global data may exist on several partition id. The default global id of a partition is the local site.

Parameters:

cid the id of the partition
